workshoptitle: Get Started with Oracle Data Safe Fundamentals

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This lab provides information about the Oracle Data Safe workshop.

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: Get an Oracle Cloud account if needed and sign in.

tutorials.title: Prepare Your Environment
tutorials.description: Prerequisites to run the Oracle Data Safe workshop in your own tenancy.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Register an Autonomous Database with Oracle Data Safe
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to register an Autonomous Data Warehouse on Shared Exadata Infrastructure with Oracle Data Safe and load sample data into it.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Audit Database Activity
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to provision audit policies in Oracle Data Safe.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Generate Alerts
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to provision alert policies in Oracle Data Safe.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Assess Database Configurations and Users
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to assess database configurations and users in your Autonomous Database by using the User Assessment feature in Oracle Data Safe.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Discover and Mask Sensitive Data
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to discover and mask sensitive data in Oracle Data Safe by using the Data Discovery and Data Masking features.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
